description: The Polo Soft fit puts a modern spin on classic preppy style with a natural shoulder and a half-canvassed construction. This version is crafted from plush Italian velvet for a luxurious look with a soft feel.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trim fit, with a natural shoulder, a high armhole, 3¼" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R has a 30" front body length, a 29½" back body length, an 18½" shoulder, and a 17½" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Two-button silhouette.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets. Interior left waist pocket.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: cotton. Body lining: cupro. Sleeve lining: viscose. Dry clean. Made in Portugal.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
